ActivityMetadata.Name: GH issueslistfororg
ActivityMetadata.Label: GH issueslistfororg
ActivityMetadata.Description:
List issues in an organization assigned to the authenticated user.
**Note**: GitHub's REST API v3 considers every pull request an issue, but not every issue is a pull request. For this reason, "Issues" endpoints may return both issues and pull requests in the response. You can identify pull requests by the `pull_request` key. Be aware that the `id` of a pull request returned from "Issues" endpoints will be an _issue id_. To find out the pull request id, use the "[List pull requests](https://developer.github.com/v3/pulls/#list-pull-requests)" endpoint.
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Github

List organization issues assigned to the authenticated user

List issues in an organization assigned to the authenticated user. **Note**: GitHub's REST API v3 considers every pull request an issue, but not every issue is a pull request. For this reason, "Issues" endpoints may return both issues and pull requests in the response. You can identify pull requests by the `pull_request` key. Be aware that the `id` of a pull request returned from "Issues" endpoints will be an _issue id_. To find out the pull request id, use the "[List pull requests](https://developer.github.com/v3/pulls/#list-pull-requests)" endpoint.

Method: Get

OperationID: issues/list-for-org

EndPoint:

/orgs/{org}/issues
